about.title: About Us
about.introduction: FEROCOM d.o.o. from Ljubljana was established in 1992 and over more than thirty years has grown from a channel iron seller into a specialized trade and production company for:
about.extendedIntro: Since 1992, we have been a reliable supplier of cast iron covers, grates, drainage channels, road caps, and concrete rings for road and municipal infrastructure, serving municipalities, utility companies, construction contractors, and investors. Our products are used on roads, sidewalks, parking lots, and other traffic-loaded surfaces where safety and durability are of paramount importance.
about.fastDelivery: Our main advantage is fast delivery. Most of our products are constantly in stock, enabling short delivery times and smooth project execution without delays. When needed, we also provide customized solutions according to the customer's technical requirements.
about.quality: We offer quality products made from proven materials that meet applicable technical standards and are suitable for high traffic loads. Our covers are designed for long service life and minimal maintenance.
about.support: In addition to products, we also offer expert consulting, quick responsiveness, and reliable support, as we understand that time and quality are key factors in infrastructure projects.

covers.name: Cast Iron Covers
covers.details: Cast iron round and square channel covers, manufactured according to SIST EN 124 standards.
covers.longDescription: Cast iron round and square channel covers are manufactured in accordance with strict SIST EN 124 standards. They are designed for installation in various areas depending on load requirements (B 125, C 250, D 400). All covers are protected against corrosion with black paint and allow for various inscriptions (Sewage, Water Supply, Telephone, Electricity, or no inscription).

b125.description: Sidewalks, pedestrian paths, parking lots for passenger vehicles

c250.description: Road shoulders, sidewalks, side lanes, parking lots for trucks

d400.description: Roads, streets, shoulders and parking lots with heavy truck traffic

grates.name: Cast Iron Grates
grates.details: Cast iron drainage grates, durable and reliable for various purposes.
grates.longDescription: Cast iron drainage grates are designed for long-lasting use in various conditions. They are manufactured in accordance with drainage standards and suitable for installation in areas with different load requirements. They are characterized by excellent durability and performance.

channels.name: Drainage Channels
channels.details: Various types of drainage channels for water and other liquids.
channels.longDescription: Drainage channels are designed for efficient drainage of water and other liquids. They are available in various sizes and materials, suitable for different applications and purposes. They allow for easy installation and maintenance.

roadCaps.name: Road Caps
roadCaps.details: Road caps for external water supply and gas, made from quality materials.
roadCaps.longDescription: Road caps are designed to provide access to valves and shut-offs on water and gas networks. Made from cast iron or plastic, they ensure easy access and protection from external influences. Suitable for installation on various traffic surfaces.

concreteRings.name: Concrete Rings
concreteRings.details: Concrete rings for manholes and inspection chambers of municipal infrastructure.
concreteRings.longDescription: Concrete rings are key elements for building manholes and inspection chambers in municipal infrastructure. Made from high-quality reinforced concrete that ensures durability and resistance to external influences. Available in various diameters and heights.

gullyPots.name: Gully Pots
gullyPots.details: Road gully pots for draining rainwater from roads and parking lots.
gullyPots.longDescription: Gully pots are designed for collecting and draining rainwater from roads, parking lots, and other paved surfaces. They are equipped with a sediment trap for sand and debris and a connection for drainage pipes. Made from concrete or plastic and available in various designs.

large.description: Large gully pot for higher flow rates
